Welcome To Our Shop

The Cosmopolitan Christian

"The Cosmopolitan Christian" challenges Christians to disrupt and transform culture through Christ-centered action beyond traditional salvation-oriented beliefs, emphasizing the need for the church to evolve and for a new generation to carry present truth.

12.99

Eat, Sleep Prophesy, Repeat

"Eat, Sleep, Prophesy, Repeat" is a practical guide for Christians seeking to improve their ability to hear the voice of God and navigate the prophetic landscape, answering common questions and providing personal revelations and stories.

12.99

Kingdom Secrets

"Kingdom Secrets" is an intelligent study guide that challenges Christians to re-evaluate their understanding of the Kingdom, money, and purpose, providing Biblically sound reasons for prosperity and debunking the idea that poverty is humility.

12.99
